content:
I added the following places to the original itinerary:

* Day 1: On the way to Doi Inthanon, I suggested a stop at Baan Tawai Village for shopping and exploring local handicrafts.
* Day 2: I suggested a visit to the Mae Wang Jungle Market on the way back from the elephant sanctuary, as well as a visit to the Mae Wang reservoir for a relaxing view of the sunset.
* Day 3: I added a stop at the Sticky Waterfall on the way to the Air Diamond Cafe, and a visit to the Mae Sa Waterfall Park for a refreshing swim in the natural pools.
* Day 4: I recommended a stop at the San Kamphaeng Hot Springs for a relaxing dip in the natural hot springs, and a visit to the Wat Phra That Doi Suthep temple for a cultural experience and breathtaking views of Chiang Mai.
